cgcloud__Fund_Transaction_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Fund_Transaction_Template__c
cgcloud__Fund_Transaction_Template__c.description: Template for the creation of a transaction for the Fund.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Determines whether the template is active.

cgcloud__Currency__c.description: Currency of the sales organization that's linked to this Fund Transaction Template.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales org of the Transaction template.

cgcloud__Transaction_Type__c.description: Stores the transaction type of the selected fund transaction template.
